pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:5.1: 81. The training rule on what is expired
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:6.2: At that time the nun Thullanandā assembled a group of senior monks,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:6.3: intending to give the full ordination to a trainee nun. But after seeing much staple and non-staple food, she dismissed the senior monks, saying,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:6.4: “Venerables, I won’t give the full ordination to the trainee nun just yet.” She then assembled Devadatta, Kokālika, Kaṭamodakatissaka, Khaṇḍadeviyā-putta, and Samuddadatta, and gave the full ordination to that trainee nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:7.2: “How could Venerable Thullanandā, with expired consent, give the full ordination to a trainee nun?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:7.3: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:7.6: How can the nun Thullanandā, with expired consent, give the full ordination to a trainee nun?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:7.7: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:7.8: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:8.1: ‘If, with expired consent, a nun gives the full ordination to a trainee nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:10.2: with an assembly that has left.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:10.4: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:11.1: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:11.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:11.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:11.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:11.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:12.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:13.1: The eleventh training rule is finished.
